titleStmt.title: An act for the better observation of the Lords-Day. At the Parliament begun at Westminster, the seventeenth day of Septemb. An. Dom. 1656.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: October quarter-sessions 1657. Signed: Christopher Powell, Cler. of the Peace.
Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
